title: Tequila Sunrise
description:
VIDEO: 115 min. PAL 16:9 1.85:1
AUDIO (Dolby Surround): English, Spanish, German
SUBTITLES: English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Icelandic, Dutch, Polish, Czech, Greek, Croatian, Hebrew, Turkish, English and German for hearing impaired
QUALITY: Full DVD without compression
YEAR: 1988
GENRE: Thriller, Action, Romance
DIRECTOR: Robert Towne
CAST: Mel Gibson, Michelle Pfeiffer, Kurt Russell, Raul Julia
PLOT: Mac Mckussic is an unlikely drug dealer who wants to go straight. His old and best friend Nick Frescia is now a cop who is assigned to investigate and bring him to justice. Mac is very attracted to Jo Ann, the owner of a stylish restaurant. Nick gets close to Jo Ann attempting to know more about Mac&#039;s drug dealing plans and his connections with the Mexican dealer Carlos, who the police believe is coming to town to meet with him. Nick also falls for Jo Ann&#039;s charms and his friendship with Mac is in danger.
